SYN_015_2_5: patient with left mainstem blockage... did a rigid bronch in the OR... tumor was blocking everything so we used the cryo probe to pull chunks out and apc to burn the rest... still looked like it might close up so we put in an aero stent 12 by 40... used fluoro to see where it went... looks good now wide open... back to icu start saline nebs.
